name: A Childhood Memory
description:
A Childhood Memory 

A game about a toy that gets thrown down a well, trying to get back to its owner. A hard platformer with doublejump and walljump mechanics. Try beating it as fast as you can. You complete the game by reaching the top.

Please upload a video of your fastest run! :D

The game was done in 4 days during the Global Game Jam by students from Sweden Gothenburg.  

Controls   

Recommended to play with a keyboard.

WASD - Character movement

SPACE - Jump

Mehcanics 

Sliding against walls

Jump from walls

Taking green orb gives you another jump

      

Please leave some feedback!
